Frequently Asked Questions

How does the free plan work?

The free plan includes everything you need to get started. You can boost individual meals for AED 49 each when you want extra visibility.

What are meal boosts?

Meal boosts make your dishes appear higher in search results and recommendations, helping you get more orders.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

How do I get started?

Simply sign up for free, add your menu items, and start receiving orders. Upgrading to Growth is optional and can be done anytime.
